PackageOracle.name: DA_LINEAR_CONTENT_LOCATOR
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_LINEAR_CONTENT_LOCATOR
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.58.176579000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,television_market_area_id IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_id IN NUMBER
,linear_source_map_id IN NUMBER
,linear_content_locator_label IN VARCHAR2
,station_map_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,television_market_area_id IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_id IN NUMBER
,linear_source_map_id IN NUMBER
,linear_content_locator_label IN VARCHAR2
,station_map_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,television_market_area_id IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_id IN NUMBER
,linear_source_map_id IN NUMBER
,linear_content_locator_id IN NUMBER
,linear_content_locator_label IN VARCHAR2
,station_map_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,linear_content_locator_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_linear_content_locator;

body.name: DA_LINEAR_CONTENT_LOCATOR
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_LINEAR_CONTENT_LOCATOR
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.58.188184000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,television_market_area_id IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_id IN NUMBER
,linear_source_map_id IN NUMBER
,linear_content_locator_label IN VARCHAR2
,station_map_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_linear_content_locator.add(fx), parms=' || television_market_area_id || '|' || linear_content_source_id || '|' || linear_source_map_id || '|' || linear_content_locator_label || '|' || station_map_source_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_linear_content_locator a
(
a.television_market_area_id
,a.linear_content_source_id
,a.linear_source_map_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.linear_content_locator_id
,a.linear_content_locator_label
,a.station_map_source_nm
)
VALUES
(
add.television_market_area_id
,add.linear_content_source_id
,add.linear_source_map_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,chtr.s_linear_content_locator_id.NEXTVAL
,add.linear_content_locator_label
,add.station_map_source_nm
) RETURNING a.linear_content_locator_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_linear_content_locator.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,television_market_area_id IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_id IN NUMBER
,linear_source_map_id IN NUMBER
,linear_content_locator_label IN VARCHAR2
,station_map_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_linear_content_locator.add, parms=' || television_market_area_id || '|' || linear_content_source_id || '|' || linear_source_map_id || '|' || linear_content_locator_label || '|' || station_map_source_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_linear_content_locator a
(
a.television_market_area_id
,a.linear_content_source_id
,a.linear_source_map_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.linear_content_locator_id
,a.linear_content_locator_label
,a.station_map_source_nm
)
VALUES
(
add.television_market_area_id
,add.linear_content_source_id
,add.linear_source_map_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,chtr.s_linear_content_locator_id.NEXTVAL
,add.linear_content_locator_label
,add.station_map_source_nm
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_linear_content_locator.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,television_market_area_id IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_source_id IN NUMBER
,linear_source_map_id IN NUMBER
,linear_content_locator_id IN NUMBER
,linear_content_locator_label IN VARCHAR2
,station_map_source_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_linear_content_locator.add, parms=' || television_market_area_id || '|' || linear_content_source_id || '|' || linear_source_map_id || '|' || linear_content_locator_id || '|' || linear_content_locator_label || '|' || station_map_source_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_linear_content_locator a
(
a.television_market_area_id
,a.linear_content_source_id
,a.linear_source_map_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.linear_content_locator_id
,a.linear_content_locator_label
,a.station_map_source_nm
)
VALUES
(
add.television_market_area_id
,add.linear_content_source_id
,add.linear_source_map_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.linear_content_locator_id
,add.linear_content_locator_label
,add.station_map_source_nm
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_linear_content_locator.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,linear_content_locator_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_linear_content_locator.del, parms=' || linear_content_locator_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_linear_content_locator a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.linear_content_locator_id = del.linear_content_locator_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_linear_content_locator.del');

END del;

END da_linear_content_locator;
